item.title: Alissa add a quote by E.M. Forster
item.description: "Only connect!" -- E.M. Forster

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Alissa add a quote by A.A. Milne
Alissa add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Abraham Coles
item.description: "Day of wrath, that day of burning, Seer and Sibyl speak concerning, All the world to ashes turning." -- Abraham Coles

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "In the deepest hour of the night, confess to yourself that you would die if you were forbidden to write. And look deep into your heart where it spreads its roots, the answer, and ask yourself, must I write?" -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Donna Tartt
item.description: "Beauty is rarely soft or consolatory. Quite the contrary. Genuine beauty is always quite alarming." -- Donna Tartt

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Donna Tartt
item.description: "Beauty is terror. Whatever we call beautiful, we quiver before it." -- Donna Tartt

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "For beauty is nothing but the beginning of terror which we are barely able to endure, and it amazes us so, because it serenely disdains to destroy us. Every angel is terrible." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Every angel is terrifying." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Dante Alighieri
item.description: "Do not be afraid; our fate Cannot be taken from us; it is a gift." -- Dante Alighieri

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Dante Alighieri
item.description: "The more a thing is perfect, the more if feels pleasure and pain." -- Dante Alighieri

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "Sentiment and brutality, never one without the other, like fossils and oil." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "Unless you're completely exploded, there's always something to be grateful for." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "Unexpected intrusions of beauty. This is what life is." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "One thought-murder a day keeps the psychiatrist away." -- Saul Bellow

item.title: Alissa add a quote by Saul Bellow
item.description: "Live or die, but don't poison everything." -- Saul Bellow
